findmesnus.io

findmesnus.io is a snus retailer location aggregator and directions app that I built as a fun project for a friend. The app locates your closest snus retailer and provides you with its information and walking directions from you current location.

The app is built using Node.js and Express for the back end, Angular2 for the front end. Nightmare.js is used for webscraping and the Google Maps API is used for providing the directions.

Click HERE to see this app deployed via Digital Ocean at https://findmesnus.io

findmesnus.io

findmesnus.io is a snus retailer location aggregation and direction app that I but as a fun project for a friend. The app locates your closest snus retailer and provides you with its information and walking directins. The app is built using Node.js, Express, Nightmare.js, Angular2 and Google Maps API
